title: Dream5.Start
body:
What...
What are you doing in here?
You're one of the channelers!
How did you get in here?
...
I don't recognize you
but I'll find out
...
Are you here to guilt me?
Working as a guard in a slave colony
Do you think I wanted this?
I feel guilty, sure
There's no way the republic would survive without slave labor
Everyone knows that
...
What do you want from me!?
Answer Me!
Answer Me!!
<<returnToCampScene DialogAndPortraitContainer>>
